errors.simple: Can't connect to the server or API.
errors.fix:
Check:
• Is the server running?
• Is the URL correct?
• Check your internet connection
• Are you behind a firewall/proxy?
• Is the API key valid?

errors.simple: You don't have permission to access this file or resource.
errors.fix:
Try:
• Run with admin/sudo privileges
• Check file permissions
• Make sure file isn't locked by another program
• Check if you own the file

errors.simple: The operation took too long and was cancelled.
errors.fix:
Options:
• Increase timeout duration
• Check if server is slow/down
• Check network connection
• Optimize your query/request

errors.simple: Your program ran out of available memory.
errors.fix:
Solutions:
• Process data in smaller chunks
• Close unused resources
• Check for memory leaks
• Increase available memory
• Optimize data structures

errors.simple: Can't connect to or query the database.
errors.fix:
Check:
• Is database server running?
• Are credentials correct?
• Is database name correct?
• Check connection string
• Verify network access to database

errors.simple: Your API key is missing, invalid, or doesn't have permission.
errors.fix:
Verify:
• API key is set correctly
• Key hasn't expired
• Key has required permissions
• Using correct authentication method
• Check API documentation

errors.simple: There's a problem with the security certificate.
errors.fix:
Options:
• Update certificates
• Check system date/time
• For dev: disable SSL verification (not for prod!)
• Install required certificates
• Check with admin
